member.name: T:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameGenerator
member.summary:
Simple but flexible and powerful utility for generating random names
- human like, e.g. Jim Deam, Constance Calaxa, Rick Abraham Hoferle, Betsey Bataller
- or identifiers, like Sympathetic_Alligator, Dusty Doctor, Undetected_Noodle, Electrifying Minister
- or anything in between, with configurable number of components, separators, length and structure
like Bob_The_Builder, Well-dressed-Entertainer, Medium-rare SeaTurtle Eldon, RoannaTheJoblessComputer

member.name: P:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameGenerator.PersonNames
member.summary: Gets the real person names like Constance Calaxa, Rick Abraham Hoferle etc

member.name: P:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameGenerator.Identifiers
member.summary: Gets the identifiers, like Sympathetic_Alligator, Medium-rare SeaTurtle Eldon, Undetected_Noodle, RoannaTheJoblessComputer

member.name: T:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.GeneratorOptions
member.summary: Specifies the settings for the generator

member.name: P:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.GeneratorOptions.ForceSingleCharacter
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [force single character].
member.value: true if [force single character]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.GeneratorOptions.NameLengthRestriction
member.summary: Gets or sets the name length restriction.

member.name: T:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierComponents
member.summary:
Determines how many (and which) components should be included in an identifier e.g.:
AggressiveChinchillaBilly or
SillyChimneySweeper or
FrenchForkSteve etc.
The more parts you add, the longer the identifiers will be (but they might become a bit clumsy, e.g. AbnormalChineseEarthDrillerVanessa)

member.name: M:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifiersGenerator.Get(System.Int32,RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierTemplate,RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameOrderingStyle,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Gets a random identifier based on the specified template.
Bear in mind that enumerating the result set multiple times will yield different results
member.param: if set to true [force single letter].

member.name: M:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifiersGenerator.Get(RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierTemplate,RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameOrderingStyle,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a random identifier based on the specified template.
member.param: if set to true [force single letter].

member.name: M:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifiersGenerator.Get(System.Int32,RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierComponents,RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameOrderingStyle,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Gets an IEnumerable of random identifiers based on the settings
Bear in mind that enumerating the result set multiple times will yield different results
member.param: if set to true all words of the result will start with the same letter, e.g. Irena The Idiosyncratic, Tammara The Twinkly or Quintana The Qualified
Maximum number of characters in the returned string

member.name: M:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifiersGenerator.Get(RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierComponents,RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameOrderingStyle,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a random identifier based on the settings
member.param: if set to true all words of the result will start with the same letter, e.g. Irena The Idiosyncratic, Tammara The Twinkly or Quintana The Qualified
Maximum number of characters in the returned string

member.name: F:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierTemplate.AnyTwoComponents
member.summary:
Random combination of any two components.
The possible combinations are limited to be meaningful (E.g you won't get two adjectives or two first names)

member.name: F:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierTemplate.AnyThreeComponents
member.summary:
Random combination of any three components.
The possible combinations are limited to be meaningful (E.g you won't get two adjectives or two first names)

member.name: F:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierTemplate.BobTheBuilder
member.summary:
Name and profession
the order pattern depends on the NameOrderingStyle parameter (it can be either Bob The Builder or Builder Bob)

member.name: F:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierTemplate.PeppaPig
member.summary:
Animal and name - the order pattern depends on the NameOrderingStyle parameter (it can be either Peppa The Pig or Peppa Pig)
the order pattern depends on the NameOrderingStyle parameter (it can be either Peppa The Pig or Peppa Pig)

member.name: F:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierTemplate.SilentBob
member.summary:
Adjective and name
the order pattern depends on the NameOrderingStyle parameter (it can be either Silent Bob or Bob The Silent)

member.name: F:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.IdentifierTemplate.GitHub
member.summary: Adjective and noun (like GitHub repo names suggestions, e.g. Unclean Tool, Vigorous Housewife, Undifferentiated Wok,

member.name: T:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameComponents
member.summary: Which parts of the name should be provided

member.name: T:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameOrderingStyle
member.summary: Determines the order in which the name part should occur in the phrase

summary.para: The Silent Bob style - name comes last, then the noun, profession or animal
The Bob The Builder style - name comes first, then a 'The' article, and then the noun, profession or animal
or Helga The Sophisticated Albanian MountainGoat

member.name: T:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.PersonNamesGenerator
member.summary: Generates human-like names based on random first names and last names combinations from all countries.

member.name: M:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.PersonNamesGenerator.Get(System.Int32,RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameGender,RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameComponents,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Gets an IEnumerable of random name based on the specified settings.
Enumerating the same result set multiple times will yield different results
member.param: if set to true [force single letter].
Maximum number of characters in the returned string

member.name: M:RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.PersonNamesGenerator.Get(RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameGender,RandomFriendlyNameGenerator.NameComponents,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a random name based on the specified settings
member.param: if set to true [force single letter].
Maximum number of characters in the returned string
